attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think that the current PM can restore what the labour part really was. I want other peoples faith in  Gordon Brown to act like he is in charge. He may have crashed the economy, but this is the time when equality and freedom Must work together to create a better future for Britain and it's citizens.
If The Tories were to be voted in, civilisation as we no it will crumble. Capitalism has failed us, Dictatorship is not the answer (Tories) and Communism is too harsh. Surly as a nation we can work with the government to make our working lives better. Surely Freedom and Equality can work together!!!
